document.full_text: jack bell's preview of the red bulls' opener looked at the few remaining questions about the team's lineup choices and the high hopes the club faces in the 2011 major league soccer season.
document.title: red bulls carry high hopes into opener
lines_and_colors: jack bell's preview of the red bulls' opener looked at the few remaining questions about the team's lineup choices and the high hopes the club faces in the 2011 major league soccer season.
